neighbors.name: TMC Properties LLC
neighbors.claims: TMC Properties LLC is the recorded owner of the property at 1600 Linden Lane in Halethorpe, Baltimore County (PIN 1315370080), which contains a historic multi-family structure known as 'Ville Franche' ([Maryland Historical Trust](https://apps.mht.maryland.gov/Medusa/PDF/BaltimoreCounty/BA-2520.pdf)). State regulatory records associate the entity with the late Thomas B. McGee, a landlord who managed multiple residential properties in Baltimore County and City ([MDE Enforcement](https://mde.maryland.gov/programs/pressroom/Pages/042612environmentalenforcementviolations.aspx)). The entity has previously been subject to Maryland Department of the Environment enforcement actions regarding lead risk reduction compliance in its rental units ([MDE Enforcement](https://mde.maryland.gov/programs/pressroom/Pages/042612environmentalenforcementviolations.aspx)). Thomas B. McGee passed away in 2018, indicating the entity is likely currently managed by his estate or heirs ([Baltimore Sun](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/baltimoresun/name/thomas-mcgee-obituary?id=11238209)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Local residential landlord entity with no evidence of broader political influence or recent public advocacy.

approach_recommendations.engage: Contact the managing agent or estate representatives for TMC Properties LLC regarding the 1600 Linden Lane property. As the owner of a historic multi-family dwelling, they may be concerned with visual impacts or construction disturbances.

neighbors.verification_notes: Corrected identification: The draft profile incorrectly associated this entity with Nathan Roady of Virginia. Public records (MDE and Maryland Historical Trust) link the Baltimore County TMC Properties LLC to 1600 Linden Ln and the late Thomas B. McGee. Updated claims to reflect local ownership and removed irrelevant Virginia data.
